data.text: I got triggered to rant because too many people on Facebook keep asking how to toilet train their cats. It is simple if you don't like poop and pee don't get a fucking pet otherwise man up, pick up the pooper-scooper and clean the gotdamn litterbox!

None! We like them because they are beautiful as they are. Don't tell me we wasting time out here trying to teach young men and women to think they are beautiful just the way they are but at the same time we project our vanity on our pets.

Sure pets in clothing look cute. Sure its okay to dress em up from time to time, the occasional bow, a cute hat. All that is for our vanity not for their necessity . How many of us select what pet to take home thinking oh I like this dog because he'll look good in a fuckin suit?

You chose the fucking pet. You made the decision to adopt and take care of your pet. The pet didn't ask for you! The least you can fucking do is cater to what is natural and beneficial to your pet not to what is convenient to you.

Why do we insist on attributing human traits to pets? They are animals what more can you expect? We fucking arrogant narcissistic human beings buy dogs or cats and make them what they are not. Just fucking pieces of accesories to satisfy our vanity.
